snippet: Politicians and media commentators are asking whether Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain can survive any further revelations about his close ties with the Murdochs.
lead_paragraph: Politicians and media commentators are asking whether Prime Minister David Cameron of Britain can survive any further revelations about his close ties with the Murdochs.
